      • getPlayerSprites

        public java.util.ArrayList<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite> getPlayerSprites(AssetsHandler.PlayerName playerName)
        Gets all sprites for a player
        Parameters:
        playerName - Name of the player with the sprites
        Returns:
        ArrayList of all player sprites

      • getPlayerSprite

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite getPlayerSprite(AssetsHandler.PlayerName playerName,
                                                            Orientation orientation)
        Gets a Sprite by it's orientation and the playername
        Parameters:
        playerName - playerName of the player object
        orientation - orientation always of the player
        Returns:
        a single Sprite

      • getAnimation

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite> getAnimation(java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                  float duration,
                                                                                                  float scaleFactor)
        Gets an animation with Sprites. Sprites in assets folder need to be named like name-x.jpg, where x starts with 1
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the sprite. If it's in a subfolder it's the path
        duration - how long each sprite should be shown
        scaleFactor - if scaling is need it can be done here
        Returns:
        Sprite Animation

      • getPlayerRunAnimation

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite> getPlayerRunAnimation(AssetsHandler.PlayerName playerName,
                                                                                                           Orientation orientation,
                                                                                                           float duration,
                                                                                                           float scaleFactor)
        Calls the getAnimation-method. Is specially designed for a player.
        Parameters:
        playerName - the playerName of the player
        orientation - the orientation of the player, because every player has an animation in each direction
        duration - the duration of each sprite
        scaleFactor - if scaling is need it can be done here
        Returns:
        Sprite Animation for player

      • getAnimationFrame

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite getAnimationFrame(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite> animation,
                                                              float deltaTime)
        Gets the sprite of an animation with the deltaTime.
        Parameters:
        animation - an animation with Sprites given by getAnimation-method
        deltaTime - every enemy has a deltaTime attribute. Needs to be given by a parameter
        Returns:
        single Sprite

      • getMaps

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMaps()
        Gets all Maps
        Returns:
        List of Strings with all maps

      • getSingleSpriteFromFile

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite getSingleSpriteFromFile(java.lang.String name)
        Get's a Sprite by it's file name. Shouldn't be used to often (Performance)
        Parameters:
        name - of the Sprite (with extension e.x. .jpg, .png)
        Returns:
        single Sprite

      • getSingleSpriteFromAtlas

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite getSingleSpriteFromAtlas(java.lang.String name)
        Get's a Sprite by big_atlas. Should always be used if Sprite is already in the atlas
        Parameters:
        name - of the Sprite (IMPORTANT: without extension e.x. .jpg, .png)
        Returns:
        single Sprite
